comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: app.gptzero.me
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://app.gptzero.me/app/welcome](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fapp.gptzero.me%2Fapp%2Fwelcome) ### Comment Username: @woodpeckerbaby > Remove the nudge. > > ``` > ... only the first 5000 characters are shown in the free version of GPTZero. If you need a higher limit please check the subscription plans available. > ``` > Something like this. > ``` > app.gptzero.me###root > div.drawer.drawer-mobile:first-child > div.drawer-content.flex.flex-col:nth-child(2) > main.flex-1.overflow-y-auto.pt-8.px-6.bg-base-200:last-child > div.py-8.lg\:py-12.mx-4.lg\:mx-0:first-child > article.mt-8.prose.mx-auto.lg\:prose-lg > div.border.p-4:nth-child(6) > p:last-child > ``` > You may need to sign in and paste some text and hit analyze to see this. This is cost free. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/BskksLl.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Safari v1.11.11 Browser: | Safari Filters: | Ad Blocking:

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://mail.ru/?mt_sub5=52&mt_sub1=help.mail.ru&mt_click_id=mt-ds8xq6-1677363374-3741098994](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmail.ru%2F%3Fmt_sub5%3D52%26mt_sub1%3Dhelp.mail.ru%26mt_click_id%3Dmt-ds8xq6-1677363374-3741098994) ### Comment > Блокирую рекламу на этом сайте, выделяю, нажимаю, реклама состоит из нескольких окон, блокирую все по отдельности. через короткое время появляетяс снова, это сверху страницы. А внизу страницы вообще появляептяс при следующем замуске. ### Screenshots

issue.title: logz.io
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://logz.io](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Flogz.io) ### Comment Username: @jonathanvanherpe > This is the built in adguard DNS in an Asus zenwifi et8 router. From what I can tell there's no way to whitelist URLs. Logz.io is a legitimate business that isn't providing ads, so it shouldn't be blocked in your offering ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/kUiU8un.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/p1SlwJt.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- Platform: | adguard dns Browser: | Firefox Mobile Filters: | Other:
AdGuard DNS
